name: Ashtanga Yoga in Perth
short_description:
A healthy mind and body - The Ashtanga Yoga way!
Students of Ashtanga Yoga in Perth are a unique set of individuals, as they are beneficiaries of an ancient form of the Yoga discipline that was then perfected by renowned Yogi (late) K Pattibhi Jois.   Master Jois started his practice at the age of 12, and later established his Yoga school in Mysore, India, where he passed on his in-depth knowledge to hundreds of devotees, followers and students.
Today's students, and even advanced practitioners of the discipline, attending renowned studios teaching Ashtanga Yoga in Perth, learn from Master Yoga Trainers who themselves have spent many years learning, practicing and teaching the Ashtanga style of Yoga, also called the "Mysore Style" in honor of Yogi Jois. This style of Yoga is based on synchronized breathing with a series of deliberate posture and motion changes. As a result, the bodies of practitioners of these exercises generate extreme internal heat.
summary: Students of Ashtanga Yoga in Perth are a unique set of individuals
